reviews.text: Traumatizing. Very traumatizing. Took his algebra 2 class, and, after barely surviving it, I can confidently say that I still do not know any algebra 2. The only thing I learned from his class is how to do the log table.Submitted by a student

Mr. Stu is a little bit strange, he often goes off topic. His tests are ALWAYS 4 questions and out of 100 points and he never really answers your questions. He responds to your question with a question. He is a chill grader and gives lots of partial credit. Do the HW he checks at the end of the semester. Do yourHW and you will be fine.Submitted by a student
Don’t take him. I didn’t learn and he is very unfair. HORRIBLE TEAHERSubmitted by a student
